<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>The fix script adds attribute "offline_timestamp_field" to wm_order and wm_task tables to support mobile offline.</description> <name>FSM Mobile Offline Attribute Changes</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() {
var attribute = "offline_timestamp_field"; var value = "offline_device_timestamp";
gs.debug('Adding mobile offline device timestamp field attribute to tables supported in offline'); SNC.DictionaryAttribute.set("wm_order", null, attribute, value); // add attribute to wm_order SNC.DictionaryAttribute.set("wm_task", null, attribute, value); // add attribute to wm_task
})();
]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-16 21:23:27</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ab17b33b230123002ff2cb0a56bf6586</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>FSM Mobile Offline Attribute Changes</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">25371ef01b8a21109c18a9f9bc4bcb1e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_ab17b33b230123002ff2cb0a56bf6586</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-16 22:23:27</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
